vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.8;
father of: Nethanel (H5417)
§ Zuar = "littleness"
father of Nethaneel, the chief of the tribe of Issachar at the time of the exodus and an assistant of Moses
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Natanael; tribu de Isacar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
蘇押 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "渺小"
出埃及時代, 以薩迦支派首領及摩西的助手拿坦業的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
苏押 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "渺小"
出埃及时代, 以萨迦支派首领及摩西的助手拿坦业的父亲
